name: browser-id3-writer
description: Pure JS library for writing ID3 tag to MP3 files in browsers and Node.js

scripts.build: npm run build:concat && npm run build:transpile && npm run build:wrap && npm run build:compress
scripts.build:concat: rollup -f es -i src/ID3Writer.js -o dist/browser-id3-writer.js && node tools/show_dist_size
scripts.build:wrap: rollup -f umd -n ID3Writer -i dist/browser-id3-writer.js -o dist/browser-id3-writer.js && node tools/show_dist_size
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run mocha
scripts.version: node tools/prepare_readme && git add package.json README.md
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish

author: egoroof
